title: What can I do if I forget the Y536A1 phone screen unlock password or pattern?
answer:
You can solve this problem by factory resetting your phone.

![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=SupportImage&imagePath=/20141023050841708001.png)

Factory resetting your phone erases all user data from your phone. 

1.         Press and hold **Volume Up** and **Power** button at the same time until the Android screen shows. 

2.         Use **Volume Down** button to scroll down to “**wipe data/factory reset**”. 

3.         Press **Power** button. 

4.         Use **Volume Down** button to scroll down to “**Yes—delete all user data**”. Then press **Power** button.

5.         After wiping data is completed, “**reboot system now**” will be highlighted.

6.         Press **Power** button to finish the factory resetting. 

                                 Your phone will be restored
to its factory settings.
